definitions.definition: A type of small fish, Carassius auratus , typically orange -colored.
examples: For the children's fair we'll have a few games they can play, so that each child "wins" a goldfish as a prize.

definitions.definition: A person with an unreliable memory .

main_definition: A type of small fish, Carassius auratus , typically orange -colored.
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively , informal ) A person with an unreliable memory .
